title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 629 - Job Opportunities And Basic Skills Training Reimbursement Claiming
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 629 - Job Opportunities And Basic Skills Training Reimbursement Claiming

State Regulations
§ 629.1 - Reimbursement for Jobs Opportunities and Basic Skills (JOBS) training program
§ 629.2 - Conditions for reimbursement for JOBS training program activities and related supportive services
§ 629.3 - Classifications of JOBS reimbursement claiming

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 629

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§131, 131-a, 153, 158-b, 331, 366

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
